org.keycloak.connections.mongo.api.context

Interface MongoStoreInvocationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleMongoStoreInvocationContext, TransactionMongoStoreInvocationContext

    public interface MongoStoreInvocationContext
    Context, which provides callback methods to be invoked by MongoStore
    Author:
    Marek Posolda
